root.name: Nigel Mansell's World Championship
root.description: Critical ReceptionWhen the SNES version was reviewed by Mike Weigand of Electronic Gaming Monthly he awarded a review score of 8 out of 10. He wrote, "...This is an awesome racing game and making an appealing racing game is not the easiest thing in the world... Several options and tracks add flavor, and the graphics are incredibly fluid! This [game] takes time and patience to master".
